Posts.Content: My nipple was inverted but stayed that way and unfortunately I was diagnosed with lobular Breast cancer 12 months ago. I had a mastectomy and immediate reconstruction. I am now cancer Â free I cannot emphasise enough to you to go and see your gp and get yourself checked as soon as possible by a medical professional. The earlier cancer is caught the better chance of a full recovery albeit you may not have cancer. Good luck and let me know how you get on xx Report 1 Reply
Posts.Title: Inverted nipple

Posts.Content: Hello, I am 30 years old and have noticed mainly my left nipple goes inverted, it isnt always like that though, I have tried searching to find out if if its Cancer the nipple stays inverted? my breasts have changed over the last year but I wouldn't say that different or different in a bad way that you see on posters and signs or warnings for cancer, I really don't want to go to the drs about this if cancered inverted nipples stay inverted. I appreciate anyone's help. 0 likes, 4 replies Report

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply Karen, oh my goodness cancer free thats amazing xxxx happy for you lovely. I tried to find out if it would only be a serious problem if it was always inverted, mine isnt always inverted xx Report Reply
